variable.name: F33BKOTHBN
variable.comment: Any bone other than hip, upper leg, lower leg, upper arm, lower arm, hand, foot, elbow, knee, tailbone, or pelvis. Exceptions: for F33V1 and F33V2, tailbone and pelvis are included. Beginning with F33v8, cervical spine/neck is included.
